text: Egh ia bar deraghvɨra gan, karis managhɨra mangam? A Boksiam izezir kantri Betsemesɨn nguibar ekiamɨn mangɨtɨ, ia deraghvɨra fogh suam Israelian God bizir kurar kam e bagha anemada. Karis an mangan koghtɨ ia fogh suam, God osɨmtɨzir ekiar kam e bagha anemadazir puvatɨ. Osɨmtɨzir kam ti puram oto.”
